backend/main.mo: Motoko backend defining anime entries with color palettes, seeding initial data, and storing them in a map with incremental IDs.
feature_evidence.json: Report mapping implemented features to source files, components, and test IDs with associated confidence.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing responsibilities of all frontend files including pages, components, hooks, and config.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML shell defining root element and loading the React entry script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component enforcing dark mode and routing between the landing page and gallery page.
frontend/src/components/animations/Abstr: Canvas component that renders animated genre‑based presets with resize handling and reduced‑motion support.
frontend/src/components/animations/prese: Collection of canvas animation preset renderers including waves, particles, glitch, inks, gradients, and streaks.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer component displaying copyright and creator credit.
frontend/src/components/gallery/AnimePos: Lazy‑loaded poster component with fade‑in effect, error fallback, and loading placeholder.
frontend/src/components/gallery/AnimeSec: Full‑screen anime section combining background animation, poster, and text content with intersection‑based reveal.
frontend/src/components/gallery/GlassPan: Reusable glass‑style wrapper component applying shared translucent panel styling.
frontend/src/components/landing/AmbientP: Canvas component rendering drifting particles with motion and density adjusted by pointer type and reduced-motion preference.
frontend/src/components/landing/LetterBy: Animated title that reveals characters sequentially unless reduced motion is preferred, then shows full text instantly.
frontend/src/components/landing/Parallax: Wraps children in a parallax container that shifts based on mouse position unless reduced motion is enabled.
frontend/src/components/landing/ScrollTo: Displays a 'Scroll to Enter' label and a bouncing arrow unless reduced motion is preferred.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refetching dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAnimeList.ts: Fetches the anime list from the backend actor, initializing the backend if the list is empty.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and helpers for managing Internet Identity login, stored identity, and auth state.
frontend/src/hooks/useIsCoarsePointer.ts: Detects whether the device uses a coarse pointer via a media query listener.
frontend/src/hooks/usePrefersReducedMoti: Tracks the user's reduced-motion preference using a media query listener.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base with custom color tokens, typography, and component styles including glass panels and cinematic text.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering the root component.
frontend/src/pages/GalleryPage.tsx: Loads and displays the anime archive, showing loading, error, or empty states before rendering sections and footer.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Landing screen with animated visuals, parallax, title animation, and a button to navigate to the gallery.
frontend/src/types/anime.ts: Re‑exports AnimeEntry and ColorPalette types from the backend.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending colors, fonts, radii, shadows, and custom keyframes, with plugins for typography, animations, and container queries.
project_state.json: Project state file describing ANIMEXIS goals, architecture notes, known issues, and a list of existing feature requirements with versions.
